sections.description:
A beautiful ui component for displaying rating values of up to 5 stars with css only. Options are:

  • Value
  • Size
  • Spread
  • Static Color
  • Label Position
  • Animation Speed
  • Disabled

(in this html is additional angular markup to make the showcase interactive)

A beautiful ui component for displaying rating values of up to 5 stars with css only. Options are:

  • Value
  • Size
  • Spread
  • Static Color
  • Label Position
  • Animation Speed
  • Disabled

(in this html is additional angular markup to make the showcase interactive)
sections.markup: 3.5
sections.renderMarkup: 3.5

sections.description: Different styles for different rating values. Default colors are red for values equal to 2 or below, yellow for 3, and green for 4 or above.

modifiers.name: .value-0
.value-1
.value-2
.value-3
.value-4
.value-5

sections.description: The different value modifiers are defined over the $maxNumOfStars. Values greater then this value get are handled here. This is mostly useful for people hwo generate this html dynamically

modifiers.name: .value-4
.value-5
.value-6
.value-7
.value-8

sections.description: Different styles for different rating values. Default colors are red for values equal to 2 or below, yellow for 3, and green for 4 or above.

modifiers.name: default
.half
modifiers.description: rating with half stars on the end

sections.description: Styles for mouse hover effects. The star and all previous the one the mouse hovers are visible as filled and have opacity

modifiers.name: .hover-0
.hover-1
.hover-2
.hover-3
.hover-4
.hover-5

sections.description: Different sizes of the stars and the label. Additional to the default size medium there are more sizes, small and large.

modifiers.name: default
.small
.medium
.large

sections.description: Different space options

modifiers.name: default
.space-between
modifiers.description: stars take all available space to position. Space is only between the stars.

modifiers.name: .space-around
modifiers.description: stars take all available space to position. Space is only around the stars.

sections.description: Overriding default colors of ratings to display the color independent of the rating.

modifiers.name: default
.color-default
.color-positive
.color-ok
.color-negative

sections.description: By default the stars animate (fade) to the new state. These modifiers provide three different durations of the transition.

modifiers.name: default
.immediately
.noticeable
.slow

sections.description: The stars can be generated out of three different types. characters, svg's of any icon font

modifiers.name: default
modifiers.description: The default star type is svg

modifiers.name: .star-icon
.star-custom-icon
modifiers.description: Star-Characters from icon-fonts like fontawesome and others

modifiers.name: .star-svg
modifiers.description: Star-Vectors form the shipped svg images

sections.description: The the direction of the star container.

modifiers.name: none
modifiers.description: displays component elements in left to right direction. (direction-ltr)
modifiers.markup: 3.5
modifiers.renderMarkup: 3.5

modifiers.name: .direction-rtl
modifiers.description: displays component elements in right to left direction.

modifiers.description: displays component elements in left to right direction.

sections.description:
The elements a css star rating component consists of. Her you can see the html structure and the combination of elements. The star rating component consists of:

  • A star element to display the star state
  • A star-container element to handle multiple stars as a rating
  • A label element to display the additional test next to the rating
sections.markup:
Star:
Star Container:
Label:
good
sections.renderMarkup:
Star:
Star Container:
Label:
good

sections.description: The Star element.
The Star element visualizes the interactive star element it it's three fill states.

modifiers.name: none
.empty
modifiers.description: displays the star element as empty

modifiers.name: .half
modifiers.description: displays the star element as half filled

modifiers.name: .filled
modifiers.description: displays the star element as filled

sections.description: The different star types.

modifiers.name: none
.svg
.icon
.custom-icon

sections.description: The different star icons.

modifiers.name: .fa.fa-star-half-o
.ion-ios-star-half
.fa.fa-gear

sections.description: The different star colors.

modifiers.name: .default
.positive
.ok
.negative

sections.description: The Star sizes.

modifiers.name: none
.small
.medium
.large

sections.description: The Star element in disabled state.

modifiers.name: none
.disabled

sections.header: The the direction of the star icon.

modifiers.name: none
modifiers.description: displays star icon in left to right direction. (direction-ltr)

modifiers.name: .direction-rtl
modifiers.description: displays star icon in right to left direction.

modifiers.name: .direction-ltr
modifiers.description: displays star icon in left to right direction.

sections.description: The wrapper container for many stars.
The the direction of the star container.

modifiers.name: none
modifiers.description: displays star in left to right direction. (direction-ltr)

modifiers.name: .direction-rtl
modifiers.description: displays star in right to left direction.

modifiers.name: .direction-ltr
modifiers.description: displays star in left to right direction.

sections.description: The spacing between stars.

modifiers.name: none
.space-between
modifiers.description: stars take all available space to position. Space is only between the stars.

modifiers.name: .space-around
modifiers.description: stars take all available space to position. Space is only around the stars.

sections.description: Different themes for the star rating component. Easy to use as single modifier. Some themes expect a special background to look good. For demo-purpos the theme-[name]-gb classes are created.
